section.title: ClusterSetTag
section.para: ClusterSetTag applies a tag to a cluster. It identifies the tag through a tag category and name.

formalpara.title: Examples
formalpara.para: The following examples demonstrate ClusterSetTag usage:

example.title: ClusterSetTag WSDL
example.programlisting: <message name="ClusterSetTag"> <part name="clusterId" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="category" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="name" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <message name="ClusterSetTagResponse"> <part name="return" type="xsd:boolean"/> </message>
